GraphQL Codegen with React Query

2024/01

A different approach to use

import type { CodegenConfig } from '@graphql-codegen/cli'

const config: CodegenConfig = {
  overwrite: true,
  schema: [
    {
      '<SCHEMA_URL>': {
        headers: {
          '<AUTHORIZATION_HEADER>': process.env.HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET,
        },
      },
    },
  ],
  documents: 'src/**/*.gql',
  generates: {
    'src/api/hasura.types.generated.ts': {
      plugins: [
        {
          add: {
            content: '/* eslint-disable */',
          },
        },
        'typescript',
      ],
    },
    'src/': {
      preset: 'near-operation-file',
      presetConfig: {
        extension: '.api.generated.tsx',
        baseTypesPath: 'api/hasura.types.generated.ts',
      },
      plugins: [
        {
          add: {
            content: ['// @ts-nocheck', '/* eslint-disable */'],
          },
        },
        {
          'typescript-operations': {
            maybeValue: 'T',
          },
        },
        {
          'typescript-react-query': {
            exposeQueryKeys: true,
            exposeDocument: true,
            exposeMutationKeys: true,
            exposeFetcher: true,
            legacyMode: false,
            importBaseApiFrom: '@/api',
            importBaseApiAlternateName: 'hasura',
            fetcher: 'graphql-request',
          },
        },
      ],
    },
  },
  config: {
    useTypeImports: true,
  },
}

export default config
